title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.182 - Management
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.182 - Management

State Regulations
(a) Executive
authority; the combined fields of policy and administration. (b) As applied to individuals: (1)
the head of an organization; or
(2)
collectively, the head and his immediate
staff and any or all persons possessing supervisory persons' delegated
authority; or
(3)
broadly, the
persons within an organization who originate transactions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.182

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
